sentences.english: All times, how many people in order to serve the motherland has been heavy resistance difficult?
sentences.chinese: 古今中外，有多少人爲了報效祖國而受到了重重阻難？

sentences.english: We are also now able to serve the motherland.
sentences.chinese: 現在的我們還無力報效祖國。

sentences.english: Study hard, grow up to serve the motherland, it is patriotism.
sentences.chinese: 認真學習，長大報效祖國，這也是愛國。

sentences.english: The 20-year stay of Qian Xuesen in America, he made profound preparations for him to serve the motherland worthily .
sentences.chinese: 錢學森在美國的20年爲他報效祖國做了充分的準備。

sentences.english: My biggest ambition is to serve my country.
sentences.chinese: 我的最大志向是報效祖國。

sentences.english: For one day I can have two down sons so I can hold to country.
sentences.chinese: 爲了有一天我能有兩下子，可以報效祖國。

sentences.english: Mr. Salum wants to return to help his country after graduation.
sentences.chinese: 塞盧姆先生想要畢業後回國報效國家。
